name: dadeh-negar-task-manager
description: پلتفرم مدیریت تسک داده نگار اقتصاد

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py migrate
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && python manage.py test
scripts.sample-data: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && python manage.py create_sample_data
